name: ExtraHop Reveal(x) 360
description: The ExtraHop Reveal(x) 360 plugin fetches Offender's IP Address and Hostname as URLs in CE. The Plugin does not support sharing indicators to ExtraHop Reveal(x) 360 platform.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: ExtraHop Reveal(x) 360 API Base URL. This Base URL is displayed in the Reveal(x) 360 API Access page under API Endpoint. The Base URL should not include the /oauth/token.

configuration.label: Minimum Risk Score
configuration.description: Only the indicators with severity greater than or equal to specified value will be fetched. Select a value between 0-99. If no value is provided all the indicators will be fetched.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run.
